pages.text: $(li)The TNT is a block that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt_minecart)Minecart with TNT$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:weapons/bomb)Bomb$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be activated with a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l), Fire $(l:patchouli:weapons/vanilla/arrow)Arrow$(/l), or any kind of redstone signal.
$(li)When it explodes inflicts explosive damage to any near creature and damage the environment.
